message: Nemat Shafik, the president of Columbia University in New York resigned in the wake of the student protests in favor of Hamas and against Israel this year.
event_breakdown:
A number of recent events of antisemitism have occurred in the United States, including:
- A Jewish man was attacked in Brooklyn, New York by a group of men who shouted antisemitic slurs at him.
- Swastikas were drawn on the entrance to a synagogue in Los Angeles.
- Several Jewish students were harassed and intimidated by a group of students at a university in New York City.
- A student group at Columbia University in New York organized a "die-in" to protest the presence of Jews on campus.

message:
New York: Anti-Israel protesters are celebrating the resignation of Nemat Shafik, president of Columbia University, over her performance during a protest against Israel on campus.

She lost on both sides:
Hamas supporters are outraged that the administration brought the police into the campus and suppressed the protest by force.
Supporters of Israel are outraged that she allowed such an anti-Semitic protest to spread in the first place.
